snippet: Trevor Lacey scored 21 points to lead North Carolina State past No. 2 Duke, 87-75, knocking off one of the last three undefeated teams in the country.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; North Carolina State defeats Duke, 87-75, in men's action; other men's and women's college scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Trevor Lacey scored 21 points to lead North Carolina State past No. 2 Duke, 87-75, knocking off one of the last three undefeated teams in the country.

headline.print_headline: Raining 3-Pointers, North Carolina State Hands Second-Ranked Duke Its First Loss
headline.main: Raining 3-Pointers, North Carolina State Hands Second-Ranked Duke Its First Loss
